name: initialize_vault
attributes: # [doc = " 初期化：vault を PDA で生成し、authority と bump を保存"]
body: let vault = & mut ctx . accounts . vault ;
vault . authority = ctx . accounts . authority . key () ;

name: update_authority
attributes: # [doc = " オーナー変更：現在の authority のサイン必須、has_one で一致保証"]
body: let vault = & mut ctx . accounts . vault ;

name: withdraw
attributes: # [doc = " 引き出し：残高チェック＆オーバーフロー防止"]
body: let vault_info = ctx . accounts . vault . to_account_info () ;
let recipient_info = ctx . accounts . recipient . to_account_info () ;
let new_vault_balance = vault_balance . checked_sub (amount) . ok_or (ErrorCode :: InsufficientFunds) ? ;
let new_recipient_balance = recipient_balance . checked_add (amount) . ok_or (ErrorCode :: Overflow) ? ;
